content.title: Give
content.description: We're so grateful for the generosity of our community. We steward our resources wisely and prayerfully, and continue to reach spiritually curious people to help them meaningfully engage with the message of Jesus. Your donations fuel our ministry and make this possible.

content.header2: In this difficult time, the opportunity to have meaningful impact is huge.
content.text1: Giving helps us grow as disciples, care for people, and go into our neighbourhoods to introduce spiritually curious people to the Jesus-centred life.
content.text2: Everything you give fuels our vision:
content.text3: • Teaching, home church, livestream, as well as kids, youth, and young adult ministries. Support our core ministries by giving to the General Fund.
content.text4: • We love and serve in practical ways by partnering with vulnerable people as we journey toward relationship, justice, and peace. Give to the Compassion Fund to support our compassion partners.
content.text5: • Invest in innovative projects that help more people meaningfully engage the teachings of Jesus by giving to the Go Fund. This fund is the fuel that supports Jesus Collective, TMHU, and our One Story kids and youth curriculum.
